articles.title: Fuel to engines cut off before Air India crash, preliminary report says - BBC
articles.description: The plane's flight recorders had one pilot asking the other why they had switched off the fuel - and the other saying he had not.
articles.content:
Fuel to the engines of the Air India plane involved in a deadly crash was cut off moments after take-off, a preliminary investigation report has found.
In recovered cockpit voice recordings, the rep… [+3727 chars]
